description.raw:
This pull request adds a GPS sensor and two supporting classes. It includes tests and an example world `test/worlds/gps_test.world` with gps sensors attached to pendulums.

`common::SphericalCoordinates` is a class for converting from Cartesian to spherical coordinates.

`sensors::Noise` is a class that can be used for adding noise to sensors. Currently several sensors are implementing sensor noise in their own way. This class is my proposal for reusing that code, which greatly simplifies the sdf definitions and testing. 

Depends on [sdformat pull request 36](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-request/36).

sensors::Noise is a class that can be used for adding noise to sensors. Currently several sensors are implementing sensor noise in their own way. This class is my proposal for reusing that code, which greatly simplifies the sdf definitions and testing.

Depends on sdformat pull request 36.
